title: I have a 3AXL Pixel and it shut down and will not power back on. I need help getting it replaced
content: My Pixel 3a XL powered down and will not power back up. I submitted an insurance claim through my provided and was labeled a mechanical failure and is not covered. I was told to contact Google and there is no support available at this time. I am so frustrated I need my phone for work and I can't find anyone to help me.
